comments.author: Andrey.Borzenkov@ts.fujitsu.com
comments.text:
Aurora 2011-08-15

To test it registration on Novell site is needed.

On http://www.novell.com/ select "Services & Support" > "Activate My Product". After entering credentials there is empty frame with "Error From Server" in the upper right corner for some time. Then frame is reloaded and several links appear on the bottom. Clicking on "I want to register a product" goes via the same cycle and back to the same screen. It is mever possible to actualy register anything.

In my case I additionally should see the list of registered products that never appear (I thought I lost all of them initially :) ).

This works correctly with FF3.6.18 and below.
comments.creator: Andrey.Borzenkov@ts.fujitsu.com
comments.raw_text:
Aurora 2011-08-15

To test it registration on Novell site is needed.

On http://www.novell.com/ select "Services & Support" > "Activate My Product". After entering credentials there is empty frame with "Error From Server" in the upper right corner for some time. Then frame is reloaded and several links appear on the bottom. Clicking on "I want to register a product" goes via the same cycle and back to the same screen. It is mever possible to actualy register anything.

In my case I additionally should see the list of registered products that never appear (I thought I lost all of them initially :) ).

This works correctly with FF3.6.18 and below.
